settings.html:
<script>
    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
        // Get the video player element
        var videoContainer = document.getElementById("video-player");

        // Get the actual video player element within the container
        var videoPlayer = videoContainer.querySelector("video");
        
        // Get all buttons with the 'data-video-src' attribute
        var buttons = document.querySelectorAll("[data-video-src]");

        // Add click event listeners to each button
        buttons.forEach(function(button) {
            button.addEventListener("click", function() {
                // Get the video source from the clicked button
                var videoSrc = button.getAttribute("data-video-src");

                // Set the video source for the shared video player
                videoPlayer.src = videoSrc;

                // Optionally, you may also play the video automatically
                videoPlayer.play();
            });
        });
    });
</script>
